text:
So SexLife is currently one of the most popular 
series on Netflix. Now the first clip that we

have for you today is actually a flashback to 
eight years ago when the main character Billy

was dating Brad. The second clip that we have 
for you is in the present where Billy has been

thinking a lot about her past relationship with 
Brad and her now husband Cooper confronts him.

But before we get into the lesson and in case 
you're new here, I want to let you know that

every week we help you to learn fast English 
without getting lost, without missing the jokes

and without subtitles. Just like Pilar who says 
that thanks to our channel, she now understands

70% of movies. So if that's something you 
would like to do, make sure you hit that

subscribe button and the bell down below. That 
way you will not miss any of our new lessons.

If you enjoy watching romantic series on 
Netflix, I highly recommend you check out

this lesson that we made with 
Bridgeton, another hit series.

You can click up here or down in the description 
box below to watch it straight after this lesson.
